dc.title: EPIC - management, display and analysis of oceanographic and meteorological data
dc.description: EPIC system provides data management, archival, retreival, display and analysis procedures for oceanographic time series and hydrographic data. Data types include CTD, XBT, bottle data, time series from moored instruments, shipboard ADCP data, and drifting buoy data. EPIC web broser provide on-line access and display of in-situ oceanographic profile and time series data.
